alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 10 at 12:39PM MDT until further notice by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following areas, Daniels, Eastern Roosevelt, McCone, Richland, Sheridan and Western Roosevelt. * WHEN...From 6 PM MDT this evening through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - One to three inches of rain is possible between Wednesday evening and Friday Night with locally heavier amounts where thunderstorms are most concentrated. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt
